Main.title: OFF BCN Festival
Main.description: OFFBCN is a music festival born in 2014 that celebrates dance culture in a fun and transformative journey that fosters inclusion, builds community, and elevates the concept of partying to extraordinary new heights in an impressive show production. Beyond

Header.title: 11TH Edition → 13 & 14 June → Parc del Fòrum → Open Air - Day & Night

About.about: OFFBCN is a music festival born in 2014 that celebrates dance culture in a fun and transformative journey that fosters inclusion, builds community, and elevates the concept of partying to extraordinary new heights in an impressive show production. Beyond

Tickets.title: Join the global clubbing movement in Barcelona’s electronic music weekend
